name: Icewind Arrow
advancements: Grant a stack of Sharp Arrow each time the arrow fired by a Dodge attack hits a target. Each stack increases damage by **5%** for **15** seconds. Stack up to **3** times.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.
Launching a Dodge attack fires **3** Charged Arrows.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.
Double duration of Arrow Rain and slow targets by **25%**.
Sharp Arrow stacks up to **5** times. Hitting a target with Charged Arrow immediately grants **3** stacks, headshots grant **5** stacks.

abilities.name: Quickdraw
abilities.description: While on the ground, draw the bow repeatedly to attack 5 times.

abilities.name: Charged Arrow
abilities.description: Tap and hold normal attack to charge the weapon. Deal basic damage equal to **87.8%** of ATK + **5**, and **50%** more for each 1 second spent charging, up to **3** seconds. Deal double damage when scoring a headshot or when hitting an enemy's weakness, knocking them down (headshots are ineffective against Wanderers).

abilities.name: Arrow Rain
abilities.description: After any normal attack, hold the normal attack button to unleash Arrow Rain, dealing up to **287.2%** of ATK + **15** area damage to targets.

abilities.name: Air Volley
abilities.description: While airborne, tap normal attack to attack 4 times in a row in the air.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description: Dodge right before getting hit to activate a Phantasia, which reduces the speed of enemies within the area. Cooldown: 15 seconds. While dodging, you gain hitstun immunity for **0.5** seconds.

abilities.name: Loaded Arrow
abilities.description: Tap attack after dodging to trigger a Loaded Arrow, which **knocking the target back** and dealing damage equal to **124%** of ATK + **7**.

abilities.name: Piercing Arrow
abilities.description: Perform a backflip and fire **3** piercing arrows, with the main arrow deals damage equal to **258.3%** of ATK + **14**, and the other two arrows deal 60% damage. In addition, **knock targets back** and stun them for **5** seconds if they collide with an obstacle. Cooldown: **12** seconds.

abilities.name: Explosive Barrage
abilities.description: When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, **remove all debuffs from the wielder**, and create a hailstorm at the target location upon switching to this weapon, dealing damage equal to **570%** of ATK + **30**. The storm has a **10%** chance to inflict a **2** seconds **freeze effect**. Gain cold front, and increase speed by **45%** for **7** seconds.

recommendedMatrices.name: Frigg
recommendedMatrices.description: A good choice for Frost teams as it adds another buff for Icewind Vector to apply.

recommendedMatrices.name: Crow
recommendedMatrices.description: High damage matrix set when you have high crit rate.

recommendedMatrices.name: Sobek
recommendedMatrices.description: A good substitute for SSR damage chips if you don't have them. Very useful against groups of mobs, i.e. in Bygone Phantasm.
